name: Petra Wallet
description: A web3 wallet to explore Aptos by Aptos Labs
bio:
Petra makes it easy to store your assets, transact with friends, and connect with apps on the Aptos blockchain.
Our industry-leading partners and Aptos’ scalable, lightning-fast protocol lets you buy APT, send tokens and experience the magic of web3 in moments.
Safely store and manage all your assets in Petra, a self-custodial wallet. Whether it’s the latest NFT drop, a prized collectible, or any other token - we support it all.
